participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a strong sense of responsibility. Open to new opportunities and dedicated to her family's success.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my daughter is a child prodigy. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, enjoys exploring new relationships and experiences. Loves animals and finds joy in caring for them.
participant_2.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i've three dogs. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.
